reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is very knowledgeable and provides clear explanations. The coursework is challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Smith makes complex topics easy to understand and is always available for help. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is a good lecturer, but the class can be quite demanding. Extra study is needed to keep up.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is enthusiastic and engaging. The labs are well-organized and provide a hands-on learning experience.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Brown is passionate about the subject and makes learning enjoyable. Her exams are fair and well-structured.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dr. Green covers the material thoroughly but can be a bit dry. The exams are quite challenging.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Lee provides a comprehensive overview of historical events and encourages critical thinking. Class discussions are lively.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Adams has a deep understanding of philosophy, but the lectures can be hard to follow. The grading is strict.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is approachable and makes the subject matter relevant. Group projects are a major part of the grade.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Turner is an excellent instructor with practical industry experience. His classes are challenging but very rewarding.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson is knowledgeable, but the class can be quite lecture-heavy. The exams are based on a lot of memorization.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Scott brings real-world examples into the classroom and encourages debate. Assignments are thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is very engaging and passionate about the subject. The field trips are a great addition to the coursework.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. King is thorough but the pace of the class can be fast. Additional practice problems are necessary for exams.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Young provides a clear understanding of language theories and is very supportive. The coursework is well-organized.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Dr. Wright is talented and passionate about music. The class is interactive and allows for creative expression.

reviews.subject: Theater
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is inspiring and encourages students to explore their creativity. The projects are very engaging.

reviews.subject: Gender Studies
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis fosters an inclusive environment and encourages open discussion. The assignments are challenging but insightful.

reviews.subject: Geography
reviews.review: Dr. Walker covers the material well but the class can be quite theoretical. Fieldwork is a key component of the course.

reviews.subject: Nutrition
reviews.review: Dr. Hill is very knowledgeable and provides practical advice. The class includes hands-on activities that enhance learning.

reviews.subject: Astronomy
reviews.review: Dr. Robinson's passion for astronomy is evident. The lectures are engaging and the observational sessions are a highlight.
